description:
Yukimura Misato is head of talent for http://anidb.net/ch40703 [Cosmopop]. She observes http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L.Signal] at their New Year`s gig, signs them to the record company immediately afterwards and works to get them a http://anidb.net/ch40661 [debut]. She wears pink glasses often, and is tall.
She is soft spoken but seems quite able to get what she wants when she wants it. She is up on current affairs and may be wiser to http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta]`s powers than she lets on.
name: Yukimura Misato
